newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Chase says will be Belfox market maker from Tues.
newsitem.headline: Chase says will be Belfox market maker from Tues.

text.p: London-based Chase Manhattan Bank said on Thursday it will be a market maker in short-term interest rate contracts on the Belgian Futures and Options exchange (Belfox) starting Tuesday.
The bank will be the first London-based market maker to set up a direct link to the Belfox trading system. Deals will be done via computer terminals based in London, it said.

"This move demonstrates Chase's ability to compete on a global scale and at the same time, show commitment to local European markets," Rob Standing, the bank's head of trading in London, said in the statement.
Banking sources named Chase Manhattan last month as a future market maker after Belfox said it was in talks with three London houses.
